column22: 60f6423e8947a20489a96051];To Kill a Mockingbird;This book cover is one of many given to Harper Lee's classic work To Kill a Mockingbird (1960). The novel won a Pulitzer Prize in 1961 and the next year was made into an Academy Award-winning film.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/f0c37c95-af79-42d4-bd96-5888181031e8-AriumWeb20x9.004.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/346fa06b-c795-405d-b12c-63b8c21860d7-AriumWeb1x1.028.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

60f6423e8947a20489a96071];The Great Gatsby;F. Scott Fitzgerald’s The Great Gatsby is distinguished as one of the greatest texts for introducing students to the art of reading literature critically (which means you may have read it in school).;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/45ed8c91-c904-4c35-b57e-1e15a4dfa883-AriumWeb1x1.003.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column22: 60f6423e8947a20489a9606f];A Passage to India;E.M. Forster wrote his novel A Passage to India after multiple trips to the country throughout his early life.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/f0c37c95-af79-42d4-bd96-5888181031e8-AriumWeb20x9.004.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7fa5fc19-e318-4c92-9478-1fc566b92e23-AriumWeb1x1.015.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column20: 60cabc7927a131004ccea222];["60f6423e8947a20489a96061"];Invisible Man;Often confused with H.G. Wells’s science-fiction novella of nearly the same name (just subtract a “The”)
column21: Ralph Ellison’s Invisible Man is a groundbreaking novel in the expression of identity for the African American male.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/346fa06b-c795-405d-b12c-63b8c21860d7-AriumWeb1x1.028.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column23: perhaps the most influential and well-known work of Spanish literature
column24: was first published in full in 1615.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/e84c4301-3e79-4813-ae80-4611552b4304-AriumWeb20x9.003.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/45ed8c91-c904-4c35-b57e-1e15a4dfa883-AriumWeb1x1.003.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column22: 60f6423e8947a20489a96053];Beloved;Toni Morrison’s 1987 spiritual and haunting novel Beloved tells the story of an escaped slave named Sethe who has fled to Cincinnati
60f6423e8947a20489a9607f];Mrs. Dalloway;Possibly the most idiosyncratic novel of this list
column23: Virginia Woolf’s Mrs. Dalloway describes exactly one day in the life of a British socialite named Clarissa Dalloway.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7fa5fc19-e318-4c92-9478-1fc566b92e23-AriumWeb1x1.015.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column20: 60cabc7927a131004ccea272];["60f6423e8947a20489a9607e"];Things Fall Apart;The Western canon of “great literature” often focuses on writers who come from North America or Europe and often ignores accomplished writers and amazing works of literature from other parts of the world.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/e84c4301-3e79-4813-ae80-4611552b4304-AriumWeb20x9.003.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/346fa06b-c795-405d-b12c-63b8c21860d7-AriumWeb1x1.028.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column21: another novel often assigned for reading in school
column22: was initially published in 1847 under the pseudonym Currer Bell to disguise the fact that the writer was a woman.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/f0c37c95-af79-42d4-bd96-5888181031e8-AriumWeb20x9.004.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/45ed8c91-c904-4c35-b57e-1e15a4dfa883-AriumWeb1x1.003.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

60f6423e8947a20489a96081];Vertigo;A former detective with a fear of heights is hired to follow a woman apparently possessed by the past in Alfred Hitchcock’s timeless thriller about obsession.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/17a0393f-bbff-494a-bb7d-e32f36413ced-AriumWeb1x1.031.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column21: 60f6423e8947a20489a96055];Citizen Kane;Given extraordinary freedom by Hollywood studio RKO for his debut film
column22: boy wonder Welles created a modernist masterpiece that is regularly voted the best film ever made.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/e84c4301-3e79-4813-ae80-4611552b4304-AriumWeb20x9.003.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7fa5fc19-e318-4c92-9478-1fc566b92e23-AriumWeb1x1.015.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

60f6423e8947a20489a9606e];Tokyo Story;The final part of Yasujiro Ozu’s loosely connected ‘Noriko’ trilogy is a devastating story of elderly grandparents brushed aside by their self-involved family.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/f0c37c95-af79-42d4-bd96-5888181031e8-AriumWeb20x9.004.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/346fa06b-c795-405d-b12c-63b8c21860d7-AriumWeb1x1.028.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

60f6423e8947a20489a96082];La Règle du jeu;John Ford created perhaps the greatest of all westerns with this tale of a Civil War veteran doggedly hunting the Comanche who have kidnapped his niece.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/45ed8c91-c904-4c35-b57e-1e15a4dfa883-AriumWeb1x1.003.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column20: 60cabc7927a131004ccea2ea];["60f6423e8947a20489a96072"];Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans;An impression of city life in the Soviet Union
column21: The Man with a Movie Camera is the best-known film of experimental documentary pioneer Dziga Vertov.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/e84c4301-3e79-4813-ae80-4611552b4304-AriumWeb20x9.003.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/17a0393f-bbff-494a-bb7d-e32f36413ced-AriumWeb1x1.031.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column20: 60cabc7927a131004ccea2fe];["60f6423e8947a20489a9608f"];The Passion of Joan of Arc;Silent cinema at its most sublimely expressive
column21: Carl Theodor Dreyer’s masterpiece is an austere but hugely affecting dramatisation of the trial of St Joan.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/f0c37c95-af79-42d4-bd96-5888181031e8-AriumWeb20x9.004.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7fa5fc19-e318-4c92-9478-1fc566b92e23-AriumWeb1x1.015.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b

column22: Sergei Eisenstein’s film about a 1905 naval mutiny was revolutionary in both form and content.;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/7a688421-b94a-48ad-9431-ae618a13cd40-AriumWeb20x9.002.png;https://nftjapan.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/image/346fa06b-c795-405d-b12c-63b8c21860d7-AriumWeb1x1.028.png;60a37171dbb59f004e5a2f4e;60be2d9d6a90b5004d9d6a1b
